markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spirit-Sealing Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=983)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 160 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round (or 4 rounds)

**Usage** affixed to one  undead  creature

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This classic fulu seals the negative energy within an undead, freezing it in its tracks. Upon affixing, the target undead must attempt a Will save or be [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 1 round.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Spirit-Sealing Fulu
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 160 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC is 17.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Spirit-Sealing Fulu (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 160 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 155 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC is 27. On a critical failure, the undead is paralyzed for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.
name: Spirit-Sealing Fulu
